css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-42817621-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;flex-basis:fit-content;min-width:initial;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-42817621-u{padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px;margin-left:auto;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-42817621-u{padding-right:10px;padding-left:10px;}}
